• Hands-on experience with prototyping platforms such as Veloce proFPGA CS, HAPS, Protium, proFPGA, and ZeBu.
• Support system bring-up, DVT, and factory qualification as part of full product lifecycle.
• AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program Bachelors or Masters degree in computer engineering/Electrical Engineering Investor Relations Financial Information Board of Directors Governance Documents SEC Filings.
• Lead the validation and bring-up of FPGA-based prototyping platforms, ensuring functionality and performance meet design specifications.
• Work with Emulation and Prototyping platforms to develop and validate complex system prototypes.
• Design, implement, and optimize FPGA IPs in Verilog/SystemVerilog (or VHDL) for datacenter-class systems.
• Bring up FPGAs on custom PCB platforms, executing validation and debugging at the board/system level.
• Use FPGA toolchains (Xilinx Vivado, EDA toolchains or similar) for synthesis, P&R, and debugging.
• R&D Engineer II Waterloo, Canada Lead Product Specialist Dubai, United Arab Emirates R&D Engineer II (f/m) Montigny-le-Bretonneux, France R&D Engineer Pune, India.

• Pursuing a bachelor of science in Computer Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science or related technical degree with a GPA of 3.
• Currently enrolled in a full-time degree program and returning to university after the completion of the internship program.
• Experience in object-oriented computer programming such as Java, C++, and C#.
• High-school object-oriented computer programming experience.
• Work alongside software developers during the design, implementation and verification process.
• Gain knowledge related to development tools and processes.
• Investigate defects in production code.
• Develop unit and regression tests.
• R&D Engineer II Waterloo, Canada Lead Product Specialist Dubai, United Arab Emirates R&D Engineer II (f/m) Montigny-le-Bretonneux, France R&D Engineer Pune, India.
